name: Memento Noir
description:
Summary -

Made as part of a virtual reality & 3D environments class, Memento Noir is a short VR experience in which you play as a homicide detective in a far future neo-noir type setting.

Features simple, interaction based puzzles & a narrative that, let's be honest; shouldn't be taken too seriously. 

Currently features full VR support with a non-VR testing mode, (A fully playable non-VR mode is currently in the works).

Controls - VR:

Thumb pads to teleport

Triggers to interact/grab

Non-VR Testing:

W, A, S, D to move

Right-click to interact/grab

Connor Dalton - @connor_dalton (Lead programmer & 3D artist).
